definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify

sentences.english: The requirements of enterprise establishment are one of the important contents of enterprise organization law.
sentences.chinese: 企業設立條件是企業組織法規範的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: The specifications of the files are listed below and the file names should match the activity name.
sentences.chinese: 這些文件的規範在下面列示，文件名必須匹配活動名。

sentences.english: Others simply regulate the use of the base standards.
sentences.chinese: 其他的一些簡單地規範了基底標準的使用。

sentences.english: Teacher points the words and students read after it.
sentences.chinese: 師用拍手的方式，讓學生跟讀幾個單詞的規範語音。

sentences.english: They are powerful for finding faults both in implementation and specifications.
sentences.chinese: 它們還可以有效的查找到執行與規範中的錯誤。

sentences.english: See also the "Attribute evaluation specifications" below.
sentences.chinese: 另請參閱下面的“屬性計算規範”。

sentences.english: In either case, the relevant specification should always prescribe the acceptable performance tolerances .
sentences.chinese: 在其它案例中，相關規範應描述可允收性能允差。

sentences.english: They also rue the inwardness of Japanese firms that resist co-operating with others.
sentences.chinese: 它們同樣規範日本內部的公司來抵制與其公司的合作。

sentences.english: The command of the accurate pronunciation of polyphonic characters is the key to the standardization of Chinese character pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 準確掌握多音異讀字是人們規範認讀漢字的關鍵。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the reception and examination of appeal should be standardized.
sentences.chinese: 再次，應規範立卷受理和立案審查兩個階段。

sentences.english: Stanely:Maybe if there are more foreign investments, there will be more regulations to protect foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 我想或許外資一多，就會有規範來保障外商吧。

sentences.english: The specification does not mandate support for a particular codeset.
sentences.chinese: 規範不支持特殊的代碼集。

sentences.english: What we see here does not add up to traditional Corded Ware cultural norms.
sentences.chinese: 我們在這所看到的並不等於傳統的有線窯文化規範。

sentences.english: The relationships among the needs and preferences were examined through canonical variate analysis.
sentences.chinese: 需求和偏好之間的關係由規範變量分析來檢測。

sentences.english: The Environmental Protection Agency does not regulate manganese under the Safe Drinking Water Act.
sentences.chinese: 環境保護機構沒有按照安全飲用水法案規範錳的含量。

sentences.english: Bibliographical citations also are tightly structured.
sentences.chinese: 書目引用方式亦有其嚴格規範。

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
